title: Simply delicious coq au vin
ingredients: ['50g butter', '4 chicken breast fillets', '2 tablespoons flour', '1 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '500ml water', '250ml red wine', '3 carrots, diced', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 teaspoon thyme', '1 teaspoon parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste']
